  • Method Details

    • getCurrentWeatherConditions

      public String getCurrentWeatherConditions(String region) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Gets the weather conditions from a given region as text
      Parameters:
      region - the region, can be given as US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name
      Returns:
      weather condition, for example: Clear
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • getCurrentTemperature

      public double getCurrentTemperature(String region, TempScaleEnum tempScale) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Gets the current temperature from a given region as text
      Parameters:
      region - the region, can be given as US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name
      tempScale - the scale of temperature, use the TempScaleEnum enum for temperature scale, defaults to celcius if invalid tempScale given
      Returns:
      temperature in either farenheight or celcius, depending on tempScale
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

      region - the region, can be given as US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name
      tempScale - the scale of temperature, use the TempScaleEnum enum for temperature scale, defaults to celcius if invalid tempScale given

    • getWindSpeed

      public double getWindSpeed(String region, SpeedScaleEnum unit) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Gets the current wind speed.
      Parameters:
      region - the region, can be given as US Zipcode, UK Postcode, Canada Postalcode, IP address, Latitude/Longitude (decimal degree) or city name
      unit - the unit of speed, use the SpeedScaleEnum for unit, defaults to kilometers per hour if invalid unit given
      Returns:
      wind speed in either miles per hour or kilometers per hour, depending on unit
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
